name: Pawny (Mellity)
description:
Controls:

- WASD or Arrow for movement

- Space or Up/W to Jump

- Move in the direction of a wall while airborne to wall slide

- Jump while wall-sliding to wall jump

Objective:

The objective of each level is simply to make it to the top of the level. This is based on the idea that a pawn wants to make it to the opposite rank of the chess board so it can promote. The idea was that once the level was completed it would invert (as if you were then playing the level from the other side of the chess board as the opposite color). Sadly, I ran into some last minute issues and now the check for level completion is broken. :(  As such, you can only play the levels as the white pawn and you can never win. 

Assets:

I made them all my myself! Woo Hoo! Except for the basic Unreal assets not sure if those count though.
